subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Alain Bernard of France set a world record in the 50-meter freestyle, after twice lowering the 100 freestyle mark in the previous two days at the European Championships in Eindhoven, the Netherlands. Bernard finished in 21.50 seconds to beat the time of 21.56 set last month by Eamon Sullivan of Australia.
